TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebEventProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class WebEventProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 为非缓冲事件提供程序提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for non buffered event providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况数据的运行状况事件类型，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果要自定义运行状况事件处理，则可以从类派生， 以创建自己的自定义提供程序。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生， 以创建一个自定义提供程序，该提供程序将配置的事件写入本地文件，必须为该文件授予适当的访问权限。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. 此自定义提供程序示例很简单，其主要目的是让开发人员完全控制其基本机制。This custom provider example is simple and its main intent is to give you as developer full control of its basic mechanisms. 在实际方案中，可以使用此提供程序，特别是中提供的示例缓冲提供程序 ，作为对应用程序行为的初步探查。In a real-world scenario, you could use this provider and especially the example buffered provider available at , as a preliminary probe into the behavior of an application. 这可以帮助你在设计阶段了解可用的信息;然后，你可以将此信息定向到更复杂的提供程序。This can help you during the design stage to gain an understanding of the information available; then later you can direct this information to a more complex provider. 下面的配置文件节选显示了一个 `healthMonitoring` 节配置，该配置允许 ASP.NET 使用上面定义的自定义提供程序来处理所有的运行状况监视事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` section configuration that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述
示例：自定义事件提供程序
安装和配置 ASP.NET 提供程序

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 从类派生时，可以调用构造函数 。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义事件提供程序中使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，缓冲区中的所有事件都会立即从缓冲区移到事件日志中，无论自上次写入以来经过了多少时间或缓冲区中有多少事件。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 上次写入的时间将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent raisedEvent) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEvent (raisedEvent As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用来开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start processing the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. 此方法将事件的自定义字符串表示形式追加到特定的日志文件。This method appends the customized string representation of the event to a specific log file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 承载 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止时调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 调用方法来执行允许应用程序正常结束的任务，例如关闭资源。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#4)]
